derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: perhaps a blend of melt and weld

means.word_mean: 1. a form of rummy using two decks and four jokers; jokers and deuces are wild; the object is to meld groups of seven of the same rank
1. announce for a score; of cards in a card game
2. lose its distinct outline or shape; blend gradually;
